title: Are there some useful Guildleader tools?

comments.author: Panch.6718
comments.body:
LadyRhonwyn.2501:

You can go to

https://gw2efficiency.com/

It has implemented the guild API very nicely.

Yeah knew about that one, it works really nicely. Unfortunately it doesn’t have a function to see the logs QQ

comments.author: Panch.6718
comments.body:
AfterXII.2761:

Not many that I know of. But I was thinking of creating a wrapper class for this very purpose.

That would be awesome!!!

comments.author: AfterXII.2761
comments.body: Not many that I know of. But I was thinking of creating a wrapper class for this very purpose.

comments.author: Panch.6718
comments.body:
Hey all,

Just read about the API possibilities for guild, for me they seem very helpful but i’m not that good in coding. Are there some tools out there that help me read out my guilds data with out logging in to the game?

Thanks in advance!
